mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_id AS userId,t2.username AS userName,t1.money AS money ,'2' AS operating from ht_account_recharge t1 left join ht_r_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where t1.create_time >= '2018-03-01 00:00:00' AND t1.create_time < '2019-03-04 00:00:00' limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT t1.user_id AS userId,t2.username AS userName,t1.total AS money,'4' AS operating from ht_account_withdraw t1 left join ht_r_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where t1.create_time >= '2018-03-01 00:00:00' AND t1.create_time < '2019-03-04 00:00:00' limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}
